LSoM: Last Sunday of Month March 2019 Routes

The route selection is done using four main points

  1. Safety : Road width, flat surface and straight roads were given preference. 3 km and 5 km  routes are Barefoot friendly. 10 km and 21 km contains trail route so strictly not recommended for barefoot runners.
  2. Variations and exploration : Avoiding loops and providing different variations for runners to enjoy their run.
  3. Ease in management : Making sure all the routes can be reached on vehicle and Water and traffic resources will be  reused.
  4. Community Attention : Routes runs through Nanded city, Dhayari, Vadgaon, Dange Vasti and Khadakwasla Dam.

Map

Following is the map which provide details about the routes and key labels on the route.

Note: Play with legends for more information
